title: Dazzling Diamond Raasi Haaram: A Floral Symphony
materials: meticulously cut and set. Features 2.377 carats (473 pcs) of diamonds including brilliant-cut diamonds
and pear shaped diamonds. The diamonds have excellent clarity and brilliance.
features: A stunning three-layered haaram featuring a delicate floral design. Each layer showcases meticulously placed diamonds in prong and pave settings, maximizing brilliance. The necklace embodies a contemporary take on the traditional haaram, perfect for the modern Telugu bride or sophisticated woman.
colors: Predominantly white due to the sparkling diamonds
with a subtle warmth from the Fine Gold setting.
occasions: and grand evening events. A statement piece that will elevate any outfit.
description: This haaram represents the pinnacle of modern jewelry design, blending flawlessly with the splendor of tradition. Crafted with exceptional attention to detail and showcasing high-quality diamonds, it is both a valuable investment and a beautiful heirloom piece. Its unique floral design and multi-layered structure offer a contemporary twist to a classic South Indian style, making it a true conversation starter.
